name: ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping Method
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping Method Plugin helps to integrate and automate USPS (United States Postal Service) to your WooCommerce Store. The basic version of the plugin helps you to get shipping rates from USPS APIs based on the shipping address and cart content. Based on the postal codes and other parameters, all available shipping services along with the rates are listed for your customers to choose from.

Integrates WooCommerce to USPS

Once the USPS plugin is installed and configured with the necessary information (please visit the installation section for more info), your WordPress/WooCommerce Shop will be ready to ship using the USPS. This plugin will add the USPS shipping method as one of the shipping methods in WooCommerce.

The plugin fetches USPS postage rates for both domestic and international shipping services based on various parameters like product weight, box dimensions and shipping destination.

While checking out, your customer is presented with the available shipping services and the rates based on the shipping address and cart content. The Customer can choose the best method that matches his/her requirements and proceed to payment. The plugin displays retail or account-specific online & offline rates to the WooCommerce cart and checkout page along with Estimated delivery days.

Main Features

  • Access USPS Real-time Rates.
  • Estimated Delivery Days.
  • Restrict Media Mails.
  • Set Fallback Rate.

Premium version Features

The Premium Version of the Plugin, ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping Plugin with Print Label & Shipment Tracking automates your complete shipping process, which includes Label Printing with Postage, Print USPS SCAN Form, Parcel Packaging, and Live Shipment Tracking.
üëâ Premium Plugin Live Demo: Exclusive Live Demo Site

  • Completely Automate WooCommerce USPS shipping on your WebStore.
  • Optimise Shipping Costs with Real-time USPS shipping rates.
  • Estimated Delivery Date.
  • Print Shipping Labels with Postage. Works for all types of USPS accounts!
  • Print USPS Scan Forms.
  • Multiple Automatic Parcel Packaging Options.
  • Live Shipment Tracking within your WooCommerce Store.
  • Supports both Domestic and International Shipping.
  • Top Multi-Vendor Plugins‚Äô Support through AddOn.
  • With its user-friendly interface, Customisation Options, and powerful features, the plugin is an ideal choice to streamline your shipping process and provide a better customer experience.
  • Timely compatibility updates and bug fixes.
  • Premium support!

USPS Services

The plugin normally supports all the latest international services provided by USPS.
Some of these services include,

USPS International:
* Priority Mail Express International‚Ñ¢
* Priority Mail International¬Æ
* Global Express Guaranteed¬Æ (GXG)
* Global Express Guaranteed¬Æ Envelope
* Global Express Guaranteed¬Æ Non-Document Rectangular
* Global Express Guaranteed¬Æ Non-Document Non-Rectangular
* USPS GXG‚Ñ¢ Envelope
* First-Class Mail ¬Æ International Letters
* First-Class Mail ¬Æ International Large Envelope
* First-Class Package International Service‚Ñ¢
* International Postcards

USPS Domestic:
* First-Class Mail ¬Æ Stamped Letter
* First-Class Mail¬Æ Large Envelope
* First-Class Mail@ Postcards
* First-Class‚Ñ¢ Large Postcards
* First-Class Mail¬Æ Metered Letter
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ HAZMAT
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ Hold For Pickup
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ Parcel Locker
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ Cubic HAZMAT
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ Cubic
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ Cubic Hold For Pickup
* USPS Ground Advantage‚Ñ¢ Cubic Parcel Locker
* Priority Mail Express‚Ñ¢ Hold for Pickup
* Priority Mail Express‚Ñ¢
* Priority Mail Express‚Ñ¢ Sunday/Holiday
* Media Mail
* Library Mail
* Priority Mail@
* Priority Mail@ Keys and IDs
* Priority Mail¬Æ Hold For Pickup
* Priority Mail¬Æ Regional Rate Box A
* Priority Mail¬Æ Regional Rate Box B

About USPS

The United States Postal Service (USPS; also known as the Post Office, U.S. Mail, or Postal Service) is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States, including its insular areas and associated states. It is one of the few government agencies explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution.

About USPS e-VS (Electronic Verification System)

The e-VS, or Electronic Verification System, allows high-volume package mailers and package consolidators to document and pay postage, including special service fees, using electronic manifest files. The files are transmitted over the Internet to a Postal Service database. e-VS is designed to make it easy for high-volume package mailers to take advantage of destination entry rates.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce. We have premium extensions related to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‚Äò/wp-content/plugins/‚Äô directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‚ÄòPlugins‚Äô menu in WordPress.

  3. Thats it ‚Äì you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?

If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at the plugin support section on WordPress org. Our team will respond back soon.

After the setup, my site is still saying ‚ÄúThere doesn‚Äòt seem to be any available shipping methods‚Äù.

You can enable debug in settings and debug messages will start showing up on the cart/checkout page, from which you will get a clue what is the issue about. Hope the USPS shipping method is enabled. Product dimensions and weight is configured correctly.

short_description: ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping plugin will help you to Automate USPS shipping by displaying shipping rates on the Cart and Checkout page.
